articles.title: And the winner of 'American Idol' Season 21 is… - Yahoo Entertainment
articles.description: Sunday's result was an emotional, full-circle moment, in more ways than one.
articles.content:
Iam Tongi, far right, wins 'American Idol' Season 21, while Colin Stough and Megan Danielle respectively place third and second. (Photo: ABC/Eric McCandless)

articles.author: Bethy Squires
articles.title: Watch American Idol Season 21 Winner Iam Tongi Duet With James Blunt - Vulture
articles.description: Iam Tongi won season 21 of American Idol. He went viral for covering James Blunt’s “Monsters” in his audition, and reprised the song in the finale.
articles.content:
Iam Tongi won season 21 of American Idol Sunday night, with the 18-year-old beating out runners-up Megan Danielle and Colin Stough.
Back during the audition rounds, Tongi went viral for his cover of… [+916 chars]
